casebody.data:
GEORGY
v.
ABDEL-MALAK. No. 574P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. Edgar R. Bain, Lillington, for Georgy.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of March 2005 by Defendant for Reconsideration:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2005."
